EmailTemplate.name: BK Auto Responder.BK Auto Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Form Fill Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
My name is {{lead.BK Sales Manger Full Name:default=Vojtech Podhradsky}} and I’m a sales manager at BendixKing. I’m excited that you are considering our products for your aircraft.
To help me best serve you, please take a minute to tell me a little more about how I can help:
- Do you need technical support or a quote? - Are there any other BendixKing products you’d like to discuss? - How is your aircraft currently outfitted? Example: GPS, Attitude Indicator, Transponder, Autopilot, etc.
Thank you for your time. {{lead.BK Sales Manger Full Name:default=Vojtech Podhradsky}}
